channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20043] HiveServer2: SessionState has a static sync block around an AtomicBoolean
item.description:
private static void start(SessionState startSs, boolean isAsync, LogHelper console) {
...
    synchronized(SessionState.class) {
      if (!startSs.isStarted.compareAndSet(false, true)) {
        return;
      }
    }

startSs.isStarted is an AtomicBoolean, which makes it hard to know why this code is locked with a static lock.
item.summary: HiveServer2: SessionState has a static sync block around an AtomicBoolean

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
i think AtomicBoolean is enough, checked patch history of HIVE-19813, first synchronized was moved from method signature to isStarted checker block, and then AtomicBoolean was added, however the latter seems to be enough in this case
attached test case

gopalv kgyrtkirk could you take a look?
I removed the "unrelated" unit test in 02.patch, it was just a "POC"

+1 overall
